snippet.title: Cash Cleaner Simulator - Official Gameplay Trailer | The MIX Fall Showcase 2024
snippet.description: Get a look at gameplay and your objectives in this trailer for Cash Cleaner Simulator, an upcoming simulation game where you clean the dirty money of your clients. In Cash Cleaner Simulator, use various not-so-powerful tools to restore dirty money bills and some unusual items to their full, crisp potential! Spend your earnings to upgrade and cozy up your lab. The cash is in your hands. Cash Cleaner Simulator will be available on Steam, Xbox Series X/S, and PS5 (PlayStation 5).
